section.heading: Relation to Electronic Signatures in Global and National Commerce Act.
section.text: This chapter modifies, limits, or supersedes the Electronic Signatures in Global and National Commerce Act, approved June 30, 2000 (.114 Stat. 464; 15 U.S.C. ยง 7001 et seq.) ("ESGNCA"), but does not modify, limit, or supersede section 101(c) of the ESGNCA, or authorize electronic delivery of any of the notices described in section 103(b) [of] the ESGNCA.
